short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects short youtube URLs to the full URL. Example: https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ => https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQ...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This script takes a shortened YouTube URL, such as https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ, and redirects it to the full YouTube URL, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ. This helps to avoid any potential issues that could arise when attempting to access the link, such as the youtu.be link not working and instead showing some message like this 'This site canâ€™t be reached'.
